metadata.name: ZenMeditation - Plate 1
metadata.description:
These minimalist landscapes created by Modern Vintage Photography represent another view into their consciousness. While different in subject, the style and meaning is unmistakably linked to their larger body of work. The focus remains on the emotive qualities of forms, spaces, textures and all the aesthetics the universe has gifted to us.

Date taken: December 25, 2017
Location: Hakuba, Japan

License - Both print and NFT can be displayed privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with artist.
